description.value:
[Slotless]

Effect To celebrate your success as a Pathfinder agent, Janira gave you a compass lid engraved with your name and a Glyph of the Open Road, symbol of the Pathfinder Society. You can attach this lid to any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Compass], including a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Wayfinder], to personalize it.
